array.string: /bin/launchctl setenv DOCKER_CONFIG "$HOME/.config/docker" /bin/launchctl setenv MACHINE_STORAGE_PATH "$HOME/.local/share/docker-machine" /bin/launchctl setenv GRADLE_USER_HOME "$HOME/.local/share/gradle" /bin/launchctl setenv NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG "$HOME/.config/npm/npmrc" /bin/launchctl setenv NODE_REPL_HISTORY "$HOME/.local/share/node_repl_history" /bin/launchctl setenv WORKON_HOME "$HOME/.local/share/virtualenvs" /bin/launchctl setenv HISTFILE "$HOME/.local/state/bash/history" /bin/launchctl setenv GNUPGHOME "$HOME/.local/share/gnupg" /bin/launchctl setenv INPUTRC "$HOME/.config/readline/inputrc" /bin/launchctl setenv RIPGREP_CONFIG_PATH "$HOME/.config/ripgrep/config" /bin/launchctl setenv GDBHISTFILE "$HOME/.local/share/gdb/history" /bin/launchctl setenv RUSTUP_HOME "$HOME/.local/share/rustup" /bin/launchctl setenv CARGO_HOME "$HOME/.local/share/cargo" /bin/launchctl setenv GOPATH "$HOME/.local/share/go" /bin/launchctl setenv PYLINTHOME "$HOME/.cache/pylint" /bin/launchctl setenv PASSWORD_STORE_DIR "$HOME/.local/share/pass" /bin/launchctl setenv K9SCONFIG "$HOME/.config/k9s" /bin/launchctl setenv VAGRANT_HOME "$HOME/.local/share/vagrant" /bin/launchctl setenv VAGRANT_ALIAS_FILE "$HOME/.local/share/vagrant/aliases" /bin/launchctl setenv TEXMFHOME "$HOME/.local/share/texmf" /bin/launchctl setenv TEXMFVAR "$HOME/.cache/texlive/texmf-var" /bin/launchctl setenv TEXMFCONFIG "$HOME/.config/texlive/texmf-config"
